item.title: By: Blackbird Experience
item.dc:creator: Blackbird Experience
item.description: it's so weird because I was having teeny tiny granny square ideas without having seen the martha article (pats self on back ... and then slaps self across the face for a reality check). I like the idea of teeny tiny ... My first try wasn't nearly as teeny tiny as yours!
item.content:encoded: it’s so weird because I was having teeny tiny granny square ideas without having seen the martha article (pats self on back … and then slaps self across the face for a reality check). I like the idea of teeny tiny … My first try wasn’t nearly as teeny tiny as yours!
